description: This file contains the implementation of Wi-Fi CSI (Channel State Information) management and motion detection. It includes functions for session management, event handling, client MAC address updates, CSI data processing, and integration with rbus for remote configuration and reporting. The code also handles device association/disassociation events, data publishing via pipes, and web configuration application.

classes.name: csi_session_t
classes.description: Represents a CSI session, containing session number, status flags, MAC address list, FIFO file descriptor, and timing information.

classes.name: wifi_app_t
classes.description: Represents a Wi-Fi application context, including associated CSI app pointer, data queues, and motion control parameters.

methods.name: bool csi_check_timeout(csi_session_t * csi,int client_idx,struct timeval * t_now)
methods.description: Checks if the CSI session has timed out based on the last publish time and interval.

methods.name: queue_t * get_csi_session_queue()
methods.description: Retrieves the queue of CSI sessions.

methods.name: queue_t * get_csi_data_queue()
methods.description: Retrieves the queue containing CSI data entries.

methods.name: void csi_disable_client(csi_session_t * r_csi)
methods.description: Disables CSI collection for a specific client session, stopping data collection for clients no longer monitored.

methods.name: csi_session_t * csi_get_session(bool create,int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Retrieves an existing CSI session or creates a new one if specified.

methods.name: void csi_update_client_mac_status(mac_addr_t mac,bool connected,int ap_idx)
methods.description: Updates the connection status of a client MAC address in all CSI sessions.

methods.name: void csi_set_client_mac(char * r_mac_list,int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Sets the client MAC list for a CSI session and initiates CSI collection as needed.

methods.name: void csi_enable_client(csi_session_t * csi)
methods.description: Enables CSI collection for clients based on session configuration.

methods.name: void csi_enable_session(bool enable,int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Activates or deactivates a CSI session.

methods.name: void csi_enable_subscription(bool subscribe,int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes to a CSI session, managing data collection.

methods.name: void csi_create_session(int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Creates a new CSI session with a specified session number.

methods.name: void csi_set_interval(int interval,int csi_session_number)
methods.description: Sets the CSI data collection interval for a session.

methods.name: int push_csi_data_dml_to_ctrl_queue(queue_t * csi_queue)
methods.description: Encodes CSI data and pushes it to the control queue for external consumption.

methods.name: void csi_del_session(int csi_sess_number)
methods.description: Deletes a CSI session, closing FIFO and stopping data collection.

methods.name: queue_t * update_csi_local_queue_from_motion_queue()
methods.description: Creates a local copy of CSI data queue from the motion application's queue.

methods.name: rbusError_t csi_table_addrowhandler(rbusHandle_t handle,char const * tableName,char const * aliasName,uint32_t * instNum)
methods.description: Handles addition of a new CSI session row via RBUS.

methods.name: rbusError_t csi_table_removerowhandler(rbusHandle_t handle,char const * rowName)
methods.description: Removes a CSI session row via RBUS based on row name.

methods.name: rbusError_t csi_set_handler(rbusHandle_t handle,rbusProperty_t property,rbusSetHandlerOptions_t * opts)
methods.description: Handles RBUS SET commands to modify CSI sessions configuration.

methods.name: rbusError_t csi_get_handler(rbusHandle_t handle,rbusProperty_t property,rbusGetHandlerOptions_t * opts)
methods.description: Retrieves CSI session information for RBUS GET commands.

methods.name: int webconfig_hal_csi_apply(webconfig_subdoc_decoded_data_t * data)
methods.description: Applies new CSI configuration received via webconfig, updating existing sessions.

methods.name: int motion_event_webconfig_set_data(wifi_app_t * apps,void * arg,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type)
methods.description: Handles webconfig data set events related to CSI or vap configuration.

methods.name: int motion_event(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_event_t * event)
methods.description: Main event handler dispatching to specific motion events.

methods.name: int hal_event_motion(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * data)
methods.description: Handles hardware layer CSI-related events like device association/disassociation.

methods.name: int process_csi_stop_motion(wifi_app_t * app)
methods.description: Stops CSI data collection for all clients.

methods.name: int process_csi_start_motion(wifi_app_t * app)
methods.description: Starts CSI data collection for configured clients.

methods.name: void motion_assoc_device_event(wifi_app_t * apps,void * data)
methods.description: Handles association event for a device, updating CSI client list.

methods.name: void motion_disassoc_device_event(wifi_app_t * apps,void * data)
methods.description: Handles disassociation event, updating CSI client list accordingly.

methods.name: int motion_event_csi(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,wifi_csi_dev_t * csi)
methods.description: Processes CSI data events, forwarding to data handlers.

methods.name: int process_speed_test_timeout_motion()
methods.description: Handles timeout for speed testing, resuming motion detection.

methods.name: int motion_event_speed_test(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * data)
methods.description: Handles speed test events, pausing/starting CSI collection as needed.

methods.name: motion_event
methods.description: Main handler for various motion related events including webconfig, CSI, speed test, etc.

methods.name: int motion_start_fn(void * wifi_app,unsigned int ap_index,mac_addr_t mac_addr,int sounding_app)
methods.description: Callback to start motion detection for a client.

methods.name: int motion_stop_fn(void * wifi_app,unsigned int ap_index,mac_addr_t mac_addr,int sounding_app)
methods.description: Callback to stop motion detection for a client.

methods.name: void pipeSignalHandler(int sig)
methods.description: Handles SIGPIPE signals, cleaning up FIFO pipes.

methods.name: int motion_init(wifi_app_t * app,unsigned int create_flag)
methods.description: Initializes the motion detection application, setting up rbus, queues, event handlers, and pointers.

methods.name: void csi_vap_down_update(int ap_idx)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: int do_pipe_publish(char * buffer,size_t len,csi_session_t * csi)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: rbusError_t eventHandler(rbusHandle_t handle,rbusEventSubAction_t action,const char * eventName,rbusFilter_t filter,int32_t interval,bool * autoPublish)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: csi_session_t * get_csi_session_from_session_num(int session_num)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void motion_csi_publish(mac_address_t mac_address,wifi_csi_dev_t * csi_dev_data,csi_session_t * csi)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void process_csi_data(wifi_app_t * app,wifi_csi_dev_t * csi_dev_data)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: int webconfig_event_motion(wifi_app_t * apps,wifi_event_subtype_t sub_type,void * data)
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: csi_check_timeout
ctags.pattern: /^bool csi_check_timeout(csi_session_t *csi, int client_idx, struct timeval* t_now)$/

ctags.name: csi_table_addrowhandler
ctags.pattern: /^rbusError_t csi_table_addrowhandler(rbusHandle_t handle, char const* tableName, char const* alia/
ctags.signature: (rbusHandle_t handle,char const * tableName,char const * aliasName,uint32_t * instNum)

ctags.name: csi_update_client_mac_status
ctags.pattern: /^static void csi_update_client_mac_status(mac_addr_t mac, bool connected, int ap_idx) {$/

ctags.name: eventHandler
ctags.pattern: /^rbusError_t eventHandler(rbusHandle_t handle, rbusEventSubAction_t action, const char* eventName/
ctags.signature: (rbusHandle_t handle,rbusEventSubAction_t action,const char * eventName,rbusFilter_t filter,int32_t interval,bool * autoPublish)

ctags.name: motion_start_fn
ctags.pattern: /^int motion_start_fn(void* wifi_app, unsigned int ap_index, mac_addr_t mac_addr, int sounding_app/

ctags.name: motion_stop_fn
ctags.pattern: /^int motion_stop_fn(void* wifi_app, unsigned int ap_index, mac_addr_t mac_addr, int sounding_app)$/
